summary.span: 提供用于使用 Windows 2000 的协作数据对象 (CDOSYS) 消息组件来发送消息的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for sending messages using the Collaboration Data Objects for Windows 2000 (CDOSYS) message component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以传递邮件消息，可通过内置在 Microsoft Windows 2000 的 SMTP 邮件服务或任意的 SMTP 服务器。The mail message can be delivered either through the SMTP mail service built into Microsoft Windows 2000 or through an arbitrary SMTP server. 中的类型从 ASP.NET 或任何托管应用程序可以使用命名空间。Types in the namespace can be used from ASP.NET or from any managed application. 如果未设置属性、 邮件默认情况下已排队在 Windows 2000 系统上，确保在调用程序不会阻止网络流量。If the property is not set, mail is by default queued on a Windows 2000 system, ensuring that the calling program does not block network traffic. 如果属性设置，则将邮件直接发送给指定的服务器。If the property is set, the mail is delivered directly to the specified server. ## Examples 下面的示例可以编译为控制台应用程序，用于从命令行发送电子邮件。The following example can be compiled to a console application that is used to send email from a command line. 如果您编译到名为 MailMessage.exe 示例，请使用可执行文件发送电子邮件，如下所示：If you compile the example to a file named MailMessage.exe, use the executable file to send email as follows: ``` MailMessage to@contoso.com from@contoso.com test hello ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail/CS/systemwebmailsmtpmail.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail/VB/systemwebmailsmtpmail.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果本地 SMTP 服务器 （包含在 Windows 2000 和 Windows Server 2003） 是阻止 （通过端口 25） 任何直接 SMTP 通信的防火墙后面，您需要找出如果智能主机上有可用的网络，将 SMTP 消息中继到 t 允许他的 Internet。If your local SMTP server (included with Windows 2000 and Windows Server 2003) is behind a firewall that blocks any direct SMTP traffic (through port 25), you will need to find out if there is a smart host available on your network that is allowed to relay SMTP messages to the Internet. 智能主机是有权从内部 SMTP 服务器直接连接到 Internet 中继传出电子邮件消息的 SMTP 服务器。A smart host is an SMTP server with the permissions to relay outgoing email messages directly to the Internet from internal SMTP servers. 智能主机应能够同时连接到内部网络和 Internet 才能作为电子邮件网关。A smart host should be able to simultaneously connect to both the internal network and the Internet in order to work as the email gateway. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.SmtpServer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.SmtpServer/CS/systemwebmailsmtpmailsmtpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.SmtpServer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.SmtpServer/VB/systemwebmailsmtpmailsmtpserver.vb#1)]
